definition: other half/fig. spouse/one's better half
other/another/separate/separately
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half

sentences.english: The other half smelt a more neutral-smelling T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 另一半闻的是无气味的T恤。

sentences.english: They take themselves seriously the appearance of other in part, with be concerned about face-saving about.
sentences.chinese: 他们重视自己另一半的相貌，与爱面子有关。

sentences.english: Whether or not you're currently attached, you could be encountering some interesting romantic opportunities before the day is through.
sentences.chinese: 甭管你单身还是有了另一半，你今天还能遭遇桃花。

sentences.english: The other side is also for sale.
sentences.chinese: 另一半连体房也一并出售。

sentences.english: As a partner he is neither possessive nor jealous.
sentences.chinese: 作为另一半，他的占有欲和嫉妒心都不强。

sentences.english: Let us go on our separate ways and search for our own partners.
sentences.chinese: 就让我们各走各的路，各自寻找自己的另一半吧。

sentences.english: What is the most touching part of your partner when you are with her?
sentences.chinese: 你和另一半在一起的时候，她最动人的地方是什么？

sentences.english: For some, they finally find their one and only true love.
sentences.chinese: 对于一些人，他们最终会找到他们的另一半和真爱。

sentences.english: Entirely women want half for yourself doing god horse?
sentences.chinese: 名花有主的美女们想让另一半为自己做些神马？

sentences.english: Have your partner feed you grapes.
sentences.chinese: 让你的另一半喂你吃葡萄吧。

sentences.english: You couldn’t love your gal more if you tried.
sentences.chinese: 假如你尝试这样做，你会更加爱你的另一半。

sentences.english: The Full Moon occurs right at your midheaven.
sentences.chinese: 此时满月发生在巨蟹的中天，另一半出现。

sentences.english: You must believe everyone can meet the one sonner or later.
sentences.chinese: 你应该相信每个人迟早都会遇到自己的另一半。

sentences.english: Feeling bitterness and resentment growing toward your partner?
sentences.chinese: 开始对你的另一半心怀怨恨与不平？

sentences.english: Best of all, my sweety loves the smell as well.
sentences.chinese: 最好的一点是我心爱的另一半也喜欢它的味道。

sentences.english: One of the hardest things in coping with adultery is to actually forgive the marriage partner that has committed the adulterous act.
sentences.chinese: 真正为另一半的出轨释怀是极其艰难的。
